item.title: How Enterprises Can Bend the Programmer Learning Curve
item.description:
After you hire the best of the right kind of software developers, it may take months of training and the right kind of apps before they can successfully contribute to your business.

Keep on reading: How Enterprises Can Bend the Programmer Learning Curve

item.title: Exposing Agile Software Development Myths
item.description:
There are many documented Agile failures. While there are ways to apply the Agile principles to large software projects and large/distributed teams, they require modifications and special care.

Keep on reading: Exposing Agile Software Development Myths

item.title: Strategies of the World’s Leading Entrepreneurs: Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year
item.description:
It takes more than passion, energy and vision to be a successful entrepreneur. Tarkan Maner of Dell Wise and other top entrepreneurs reveal strategies and traits for success.

Keep on reading: Strategies of the World’s Leading Entrepreneurs: Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year

item.title: Transforming from a Hardware Manufacturer to a Software and Services Provider
item.description:
There are a lot of things a company has to do to make the transformation from a hardware-centric model to a more software-oriented one. Here are the core requirements to consider.

Keep on reading: Transforming from a Hardware Manufacturer to a Software and Services Provider

item.title: Mobile Customers Data Complicating Retailers’ Use of Metrics
item.description:
An e-tailing group study reveals customer interaction on mobile devices is causing merchants to struggle with maintaining the right metrics for wise decision making.

Keep on reading: Mobile Customers Data Complicating Retailers’ Use of Metrics

item.title: SAP-Ariba Deal Goes Beyond the Cloud
item.description:
Will the Ariba acquisition and thus winning a major share of the cloud market be a sufficient goal to fully recast SAP’s position in the rapidly evolving competitive landscape?

Keep on reading: SAP-Ariba Deal Goes Beyond the Cloud

item.title: Deep Dive into Data-as-a-Service Impacts on Business Ecosystems
item.description:
To truly understand the value of DaaS and the shifting philosophy of data ownership to data stewardship, defining the data value chain is the first step.

Keep on reading: Deep Dive into Data-as-a-Service Impacts on Business Ecosystems

item.title: Devising a Content Management Strategy Can Energize Your Mobile Workforce
item.description:
In order to improve productivity and customer satisfaction by using mobile technologies, companies need to take a more holistic approach and implement strategies in four areas.

Keep on reading: Devising a Content Management Strategy Can Energize Your Mobile Workforce

item.title: How Capillary Technologies Became a Top Provider of Retail End-to-End Customer Engagement Solutions
item.description:
Capillary Technologies is India’s largest provider of end-to-end customer engagement solutions for retailers. Its CEO discusses strategy, tradeoffs in the race to market, and the advice he follows.

Keep on reading: How Capillary Technologies Became a Top Provider of Retail End-to-End Customer Engagement Solutions

item.title: In-Memory Technology: Innovation in Business Intelligence?
item.description:
This article avoids the technobabble of In-Memory computing and instead looks at it from a practical business perspective. Is it a game-changing innovation for competitive advantage?

Keep on reading: In-Memory Technology: Innovation in Business Intelligence?
